title: Adguard 2016 + Key
description:
Adguard 2016 - a unique tool for the protecvtion of various types of advertising, as well as virus attacks that are so common on the internet, such like "The Piratebay". Blocking by this program makes irt possible to relieve the user from viral advertising and pop-ups when he travels across the network. Adguard includes the followeing tools:  Anti-Banner, Parental Control, Ad-Blocking, Anti-Phising, Flash-Blocking and other tools that make life easier and safer brows the internet.



The Adguard better than usual AdBlock? common blockers implemented as a browser extension while Adguard operates at the network layer and is not subject to all the restrictions imposed on their browser extentions.



Normal AdBlock: lock requests for promotional materials. The basis of the work of any ad-blocker - the ability to block requests from the web page of the promotional materials (banners scripts). 



Cosmetic treatment of the page: In order to hide broken and blocked items need more cosmetic treatment of the page with CSS.



Filtering of HTML-code site: Adguard works at the network level so most of the promotional items cut fromn the code before the page is received by the browser. This speeds up the loading of websites as the browser to stop wasting time to do many advertisings needs.



Work in all browsers: Firefox, Chrome, Yandex Browser, Internet Explorer, Microsdoft Edge or whatever browser you may use Adguard works in all.



Anti-Viral Advertising: Adguard checks each network request on the basis of more than 1500000 phishing and malware sites.



Filtering advertising applications: irritating advertising in Skype, MSN Messenger, uTorrent, Burn4Free, Spotify and other applications? just turn them on filter settings Adguard.



Support 24/7: at any time of the day or night the Adguard engineers are ready to answer your questions and help to slove any problem.



Don't hit and run. A minimum seed time required, the maximum seed time desired. Please seed for as long as you are able to keep this torrent alive!
